statements: DELETE FROM project_risks WHERE risk_owner = 'Alice' AND risk_description LIKE '%financial%';
DELETE FROM risk_owners WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM project_risks WHERE risk_description LIKE '%critical%' AND risk_owner = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE strategy_owner='John Doe';
DELETE FROM risks WHERE risk_likelihood > 3 AND risk_impact < 4;
DELETE FROM Mitigation WHERE risk_id = 3 AND strategy = 'Backup';
DELETE FROM project WHERE project_name = 'Project X';
